00019 EditStyle::EditStyle(QWidget* parent, const char* name = 0)
00020    : EditStyleBase(parent, name)
00021       {
00022       connect(buttonOk, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(ok()));
00023       connect(buttonApply, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(apply()));
00024       }
00025 
00026 //---------------------------------------------------------
00027 //   ok
00028 //---------------------------------------------------------
00029 
00030 void EditStyle::ok()
00031       {
00032       apply();
00033       close();
00034       }
00035 
00036 //---------------------------------------------------------
00037 //   apply
00038 //---------------------------------------------------------
00039 
00040 void EditStyle::apply()
00041       {
00042       ::style->staffUpperBorder = Spatium(staffUpperBorder->text().toDouble());
00043       ::style->staffLowerBorder = Spatium(staffLowerBorder->text().toDouble());
00044       ::style->staffDistance    = Spatium(staffDistance->text().toDouble());
00045       ::style->accoladeDistance = Spatium(accoladeDistance->text().toDouble());
00046       ::style->systemDistance   = Spatium(systemDistance->text().toDouble());
00047       ::style->measureSpacing   = measureSpacing->text().toDouble();
00048       ::style->minNoteDistance  = Spatium(minNoteDistance->text().toDouble());
00049       ::style->barNoteDistance  = Spatium(barNoteDistance->text().toDouble());
00050       ::style->noteBarDistance  = Spatium(noteBarDistance->text().toDouble());
00051 
00052       ::style->showPageNumber   = showPageNumber->isChecked();
00053       ::style->showPageNumberOne = showFirstPageNumber->isChecked();
00054       ::style->pageNumberOddEven = showOddEvenPageNumber->isChecked();
00055       ::style->showMeasureNumber = showMeasureNumber->isChecked();
00056       ::style->showMeasureNumberOne = showFirstMeasureNumber->isChecked();
00057       ::style->measureNumberInterval = intervalMeasureNumber->value();
00058       ::style->measureNumberSystem = showEverySystemMeasureNumber->isChecked();
00059       ::style->measureNumberAllStaffs = showAllStaffsMeasureNumber->isChecked();
00060 
00061 //TODO      cs->layout();
00062 //      cs->endCmd(false);
00063       }
00064 
00065 //---------------------------------------------------------
00066 //   setValues
00067 //---------------------------------------------------------
00068 
00069 void EditStyle::setValues()
00070       {
00071       QString s("%1");
00072       staffUpperBorder->setText(s.arg(::style->staffUpperBorder.val()));
00073       staffLowerBorder->setText(s.arg(::style->staffLowerBorder.val()));
00074       staffDistance->setText(s.arg(::style->staffDistance.val()));
00075       accoladeDistance->setText(s.arg(::style->accoladeDistance.val()));
00076       systemDistance->setText(s.arg(::style->systemDistance.val()));
00077       measureSpacing->setText(s.arg(::style->measureSpacing));
00078       minNoteDistance->setText(s.arg(::style->minNoteDistance.val()));
00079       barNoteDistance->setText(s.arg(::style->barNoteDistance.val()));
00080       noteBarDistance->setText(s.arg(::style->noteBarDistance.val()));
00081 
00082       showPageNumber->setChecked(::style->showPageNumber);
00083       showFirstPageNumber->setChecked(::style->showPageNumberOne);
00084       showOddEvenPageNumber->setChecked(::style->pageNumberOddEven);
00085       showMeasureNumber->setChecked(::style->showMeasureNumber);
00086       showFirstMeasureNumber->setChecked(::style->showMeasureNumberOne);
00087       intervalMeasureNumber->setValue(::style->measureNumberInterval);
00088       showIntervalMeasureNumber->setChecked(!::style->measureNumberSystem);
00089       showAllStaffsMeasureNumber->setChecked(::style->measureNumberAllStaffs);
00090       showEverySystemMeasureNumber->setChecked(::style->measureNumberSystem);
00091       }

00093 //---------------------------------------------------------
00094 //   editStyle
00095 //---------------------------------------------------------
00096 
00097 void MuseScore::editStyle()
00098       {
00099       if (editStyleWin == 0) {
00100             editStyleWin = new EditStyle(0, "editStyle");
00101             }
00102       editStyleWin->setValues();
00103       editStyleWin->show();
00104       }
